string.value: Something good might happen if you go see #b#p9010010##k.
#b#p9010010##k says if you give her a scroll, she will use magic to increase the success rate of your scroll by 5%. You can only do that 5 times today, so choose wisely.
#b#p9010010##k has traded your scroll for a better one with higher success rate. How nice of her.

The Spirit Week Event! I, Cassandra the great, am using magic to increase the success rate of your scrolls by 5% every Monday for a brief time in September. But you won’t be able to trade the scroll once I use magic on it. You want to give it a try?

If you bring me 10% or 60% scrolls today, I will #ruse magic to increase the success rate of the scrolls by 5%#k. Now, talk to me again after you’ve picked a scroll and trade it in for a better one by selecting the appropriate option. You can only do this 5 times today, so choose wisely.
Casting magic on scrolls is harder than you think. That's why it can only be done for a couple of Mondays during the month of September. Come find me on the right day if you change your mind.
